Maxime Lenormand, Boris Leroy and Pierre Denelle

citations.Rmd

2025

  • Noori S, Rödder D, Yusefi GH, Hawlitschek O, Wanke D, Husemann M & Rajaei H (2025) Biogeographic Patterns of Iranian Lepidoptera: A Framework for Conservation. Diversity and Distributions 31, e70010.

  • Cheng Z & Ma KY (2025) Historical Biogeography of Penaeus Prawns (Crustacea: Decapoda: Penaeidae). Journal of Biogeography (early view).

  • Souza Oliveira M, Lenormand M, Luque S, Zamora NA, Alleaume S, Aguilar Porras AC, Castillo MU, Chacón-Madrigal E, Delgado D, Hernández Sánchez LG, Ngo Bieng M-A, Quesada RM, Solano GS & Zúñiga PM (2025) Unlocking tropical forest complexity: How tree assemblages in secondary forests boost biodiversity conservation. arXiv preprint arXiv:2503.02523.

  • Lenormand M, Féret JB, Papuga G, Alleaume S & Luque S (2025) Coupling in situ and remote sensing data to assess α- and β-diversity over biogeographic gradients. Ecography 2025, e07479.

  • Noori S, Rödder D, Yusefi GH, Hawlitschek O, Wanke D, Husemann M & Rajaei H (2025) Biogeographic Patterns of Iranian Lepidoptera: A Framework for Conservation. Diversity and Distributions 31, e70010.
